title: Nakamura Shichisabur? and Hayakawa Hatsuse
description: The actors Nakamura Shichisabur? as Chihara Sakonnosuke and Hayakawa Hatsuse as the Courtesan Okuni in the play Shinoda kaikeizan ?????, performed at the Yamamura Theater in the eighth month of 1702
